net.kuujo.vertigo.io.port

Interface InputPort

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable<InputPort>, Input<InputPort>, InputBatchSupport<InputPort>, InputGroupSupport<InputPort>, Openable<InputPort>, Port<InputPort>

    public interface InputPort
extends Port<InputPort>, Input<InputPort>, InputGroupSupport<InputPort>, InputBatchSupport<InputPort>
    Input port on which messages are received.

    The input port can contain any number of InputConnection on which it receives input messages. Connections are constructed based on current network configuration information. When the network configuration is updated, the port will automatically update its internal connections.

    Author:
    Jordan Halterman
